tags.name: my-switch
tags.description:
Switches allow the user to toggle an option on or off.

**Slots:**
 - **checked** - Displays when switch is on
- **unchecked** - Displays when switch is off

**Events:**
 - **switch-change** - Emitted when switch is toggled

**CSS Properties:**
 - **--size** - Controls the size of the switch _(default: 1rem)_

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Adds a description for the switch

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Used to determine if the switch is on or off

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: Identifies where in relation to the switch the label should be placed
